name: Space Dock 1
text abilities: This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 2 more than the resource value of this planet. Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

name: Duha Menaimon
text abilities: After you activate this system you may produce up to 5 units in this system.

name: Letani Behemoth
text abilities: DEPLOY: When you would use your Mitosis faction ability you may replace 1 of your infantry with 1 mech from your reinforcements instead.

name: Quetzecoatl
text abilities: Other players cannot use space cannon against your ships in this system.

name: Aerie Sentinel
text abilities: This unit does not count against capacity if it is being transported or if it is in a space area with 1 or more of your ships that have capacity values.

name: Arc Secundus
text abilities: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD. At the start of each space combat round repair this ship.

name: Dunlain Reaper
text abilities: DEPLOY: At the start of a round of ground combat you may spend 2 resources to replace 1 of your infantry in that combat with 1 mech.

name: The Terror Between
text abilities: Capture all other non-structure units that are destroyed in this system including your own.

name: Reanimator
text abilities: When your infantry on this planet are destroyed place them on your faction sheet; those units are captured.

name: Dimensional Tear 1
text abilities: This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift. Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

name: Quietus
text abilities: While this unit is in a system that contains an active breach other players' units in systems with active breaches lose all of their unit abilities.

name: Revenant
text abilities: DEPLOY: During the Commit Ground Forces step of your tactical action in a system that contains an active breach you may commit 1 mech even if you have no units in the system.

name: Exile 1
text abilities: At the end of any player's combat in this unit's system or an adjacent system you may place 1 inactive breach in that system.

name: D.W.S. Luminous
text abilities: This ship can move through systems that contain your units even if other players' units are present; if it would apply +1 to its move value for each of those systems.

name: Eanautic
text abilities: When another player activates this system if this unit is coexisting you may move it and any of your infantry on its planet to a planet you control in your home system.

name: Dynamo
text abilities: After any player's unit in this system or an adjacent system uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE you may spend 2 influence to repair that unit.

name: Watcher
text abilities: You may remove this unit from a system that contains or is adjacent to another player's units to cancel an action card played by that player.

name: Heaven's Eye
text abilities: If the active system contains units that belong to a player who has a control marker on 1 of your plots apply +1 to this ship's move value and repair it at the end of every combat round.

name: Viper EX-23
text abilities: When ground forces are committed to this planet you may choose for your units to coexist if they were not already. Flip this card if your faction becomes the Obsidian.

name: Hil Colish
text abilities: This ship's system contains a delta wormhole. During movement this ship may move before or after your other ships.

name: Icarus Drive
text abilities: After any player activates a system you may remove this unit from the game board to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into this system.

name: Wrath of Kenara
text abilities: After you roll a die during a space combat in this system you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

name: Pride of Kenara
text abilities: This planet's card may be traded as part of a transaction; if you do move all of your units from this planet to another planet you control.

name: J.N.S. Hylarim
text abilities: When making a combat roll for this ship each result of 9 or 10 before applying modifiers produces 2 additional hits.

name: Shield Paling
text abilities: Your infantry on this planet are not affected by your Fragile faction ability.
During a space combat hits produced by this ship and by your dreadnoughts in this system must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

name: Anihilator
text abilities: While not participating in ground combat this unit can use its BOMBARDMENT ability on planets in its system as if it were a ship.

name: Arvicon Rex
text abilities: During combat against an opponent whose command token is not in your fleet pool apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls.

name: Starlancer
text abilities: After a player whose command token is in your fleet pool activates this system you may spend their token from your fleet pool to end their turn; they gain that token.

name: Crimson Legionnaire 1
text abilities: After this unit is destroyed gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.

name: Fourth Moon
text abilities: Other players' ships in this system cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Moll Terminus
text abilities: Other players' ground forces on this planet cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: The Inferno
text abilities: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 cruiser in this system.

name: Ember Colossus
text abilities: When you use your Star Forge faction ability in this system or an adjacent system you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements with this unit.

name: Prototype War Sun 1
text abilities: Other players' units in this system lose the PLANETARY SHIELD ability.

name: Matriarch
text abilities: During an invasion in this system you may commit fighters to planets as if they were ground forces. After combat return those units to the space area.

name: Iconoclast
text abilities: During combat against an opponent who has at least 1 relic fragment apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls.

name: Visz El Vir
text abilities: Your mechs in this system roll 1 additional die during combat.

name: Eidolon
text abilities: If this unit is in the space area of the active system at the start of a space combat flip this card.

name: The Alastor
text abilities: At the start of a space combat choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in that combat as if they were ships.

name: Mordred
text abilities: During combat against an opponent who has an X or Y token on 1 or more of their technologies apply +2 to the result of each of this unit's combat rolls.

name: Memoria 1
text abilities: You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain 1 or more of your mechs.

name: Quantum Manipulator
text abilities: While this unit is in a space area during combat you may use its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability to cancel a hit that is produced against your ships in this system.

name: Last Dispatch
text abilities: When this unit retreats you may destroy 1 ship in the active system that does not have SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Alarum
text abilities: At the end of a round of combat on this planet you may move up to 2 ground forces to this planet from planets in adjacent systems.

name: Linkship 1
text abilities: This unit can use the SPACE CANNON ability of one of your structures in its space area; each structure can only be triggered once.

name: Viper Hollow
text abilities: If this unit was coexisting when this card flipped to this side gain control of its planet; the other player's units are now coexisting.

name: Scavenger Zeta
text abilities: DEPLOY: After you gain control of a planet you may spend 1 trade good to place 1 mech on that planet.

name: Floating Factory 1
text abilities: This unit is placed in the space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded it is destroyed.

name: C'morran N'orr
text abilities: Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ships' combat rolls in this system.

name: Valkyrie Exoskeleton
text abilities: After this unit uses its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability during ground combat it produces 1 hit against your opponent's ground forces on this planet.

name: Genesis
text abilities: At the end of the status phase place 1 infantry from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

name: ZS Thunderbolt M2
text abilities: DEPLOY: After you use your Orbital Drop faction ability you may spend 3 resources to place 1 mech on that planet.

name: Ouranos
text abilities: DEPLOY: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your PDS you may replace 1 of those PDS with this unit.

name: Hecatoncheires
text abilities: DEPLOY: When you would place a PDS on a planet you may place 1 mech and 1 infantry on that planet instead.

name: Hel-Titan 1
text abilities: This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported.
unit abilities: SUSTAIN DAMAGE. PRODUCTION 1. PLANETARY SHIELD. SPACE CANNON 6.

name: Salai Sai Corian
text abilities: When this unit makes a combat roll it rolls a number of dice (hit on a 7) equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

name: Reclaimer
text abilities: After you resolve a tactical action where you gained control of this planet you may place 1 PDS or 1 Space Dock from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: Loncara Ssodu
text abilities: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

name: Indomitus
text abilities: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

name: Van Hauge
text abilities: When this ship is destroyed destroy all ships in this system.

name: Moyin's Ashes
text abilities: DEPLOY: When you use your Indoctrination faction ability you may spend 1 additional influence to replace your opponent's unit with 1 mech instead of 1 infantry.

name: Y'sia Y'ssrila
text abilities: This ship can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

name: Blackshade Infiltrator
text abilities: DEPLOY: After you use your Stall Tactics faction ability you may place 1 mech on a planet you control.

name: The Egeiro
text abilities: Apply +1 to the result of each of this unit's combat rolls for each non-home system that contains a planet you control.

name: A3 Valiance
text abilities: When this unit is destroyed if it was galvanized galvanize up to 3 of your infantry in its system.

name: 4X41C Helios V1
text abilities: The resource value of this planet is increased by 1.
